name: Face the Swarm
description:
===== Description =====
In Face the Swarm, you play as the only survivor of the zombie apocalypse! Survive for as long as you can against the endless waves of the undead horde. Killing zombies will earn you more points. Pick up weapon crates to temporarily swap out your pistol for something with more firepower! Health packs can be used to restore your health points - useful for staying alive! See "How to Play" section below.

===== Controls ===== 
- MOVE: WASD Keys
- AIM: Mouse
- SHOOT: Left Mouse Button

===== Tools Used ===== 
- Unity 5
- Microsoft Visual Studio
- Photoshop
- GarageBand

NOTE: For the best experience, I recommend you download the game to avoid WebGL's graphics and audio compression and to increase performance.

P.S. I'd love to hear any feedback you may have so feel free to share your opinions and ideas in the comments. Thanks!
